turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order a caramel brulee latte venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it looks like caramel brulees are seasonal drinks and are not currently being offered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, hang on a sec. I'd like a

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want milk in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you put some caramel syrup in there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you want a venti cafe americano with whole milk and add caramel syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Absolutely. You have it right. And I want to pick it up at 4th and Vine in Cincinnati, downtown Cincinnati.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. i'll place the order at starbucks on 4th and vine now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I'll pick it up in a few minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the drink will be ready in 10 mins. do you need anything else?
